LanguageData.Nod_Factory.label: Nod Assembler
LanguageData.Nod_Factory.description: The Nod Assembler is used to create high-tier materials and items.
LanguageData.Nod_Factory_Blueprint.label: Nod Assembler (blueprint)
LanguageData.Nod_Factory_Frame.label: Nod Assembler (building)
LanguageData.Nod_TiberiumRefinery.label: Nod advanced tiberium refinery
LanguageData.Nod_TiberiumRefinery.description: An advanced chemical refining plant. Used to refine lethal Tiberium into useful resources.
LanguageData.Nod_TiberiumRefinery_Blueprint.label: Nod advanced tiberium refinery (blueprint)
LanguageData.Nod_TiberiumRefinery_Frame.label: Nod advanced tiberium refinery (building)
LanguageData.Nod_TiberiumPowerPlant.label: Nod Powerplant
LanguageData.Nod_TiberiumPowerPlant.description: Produces power by consuming Tiberium fuel. Must be fueled by hand.
LanguageData.Nod_TiberiumPowerPlant_Blueprint.label: Nod Powerplant (blueprint)
LanguageData.Nod_TiberiumPowerPlant_Frame.label: Nod Powerplant (building)
